thought.text: Great! I can see the `nlp_statistics.xlsx` file. Now let me read it to get the student information:

action.code:
import pandas as pd

# Read the Excel file
df = pd.read_excel('nlp_statistics.xlsx')

# Display the structure and content of the file
print("Column names:")
print(df.columns.tolist())
print("\nFirst few rows:")
print(df.head())
print(f"\nTotal number of students: {len(df)}")
print("\nData types:")
print(df.dtypes)
